name: Splinter Sit-ups
how_to_perform:
1. Find a flat surface to lie on your back and place you hands behind your head for support.
  2. Lift your shoulders off the ground, keeping your lower half still.
  3. Maintain engagement through your core muscles while lifting higher. Focus on slow movements and controlled contractions
  4. Pause briefly at the top of each repetition. Lower back down slowly to maintain control throughout the exercise
  5. Lift higher for more repetitions, making sure your movements remain consistent and deliberate.
  6. When you complete the desired number of repetitions stop or modify exercises based on how your body responds
short_summary: Splinter sit-ups work the core muscles to improve strength and control throughout.
